llm.feedback:
Up | 6–12 months | Policy easing around a credible 2% target with data-dependent governance lifting long-duration asset demand; ETH ETFs, staking yields, and corporate treasury activity support ETH leadership toward a $5k–$6k re-rating over longer horizons | Watch ETF inflows trajectory, staking economics, and regulatory clarity as flows mature | 32% (OGK8WLL69)(Scraped Source 6)(Scraped Source 4)(Scraped Source 3)
Up | 0–3 months | Near-term dovish surprises or data-driven stance tilt boosting long-duration assets via lower discount rates; ETH staking yields and treasury demand would push ETH toward the upper end of the base path | Watch Jackson Hole signals and five-year framework updates for the shift toward easier policy and broader BTC participation | 28% (Scraped Source 1)(OGK8WLL69)(Scraped Source 3)
Down | 0–3 months | Hawkish shift or clearer regulatory headwinds—tightening financial conditions and slower ETF inflows compress crypto risk premia and cap ETH leadership | Watch policy tone, regulatory clarity (Project Crypto), and ETF flow momentum as a test of the base case | 24% (OGK8WLL69)(Scraped Source 3)(Scraped Source 6)
Down | 6–12 weeks | Data-dependent policy transmission failing to materialize; wage growth acceleration or tariff shocks widen deficits and push discount rates higher, tightening risk assets | Watch CPI momentum (0.30%–0.40% MoM), claims momentum, and tariff pass-through deviations | 16% (GZ9VV1RV0)(Y6SQOEK69)(EPJYXB7DX)(SGB2PAZGK)
